As Dimitrus goes slightly behind the group, Rose talks to the Arron.
We are in a tight spot here.
If our origin goes public, they will certainly proclaim us to be demons.
Relax, he does not seem to suspect anything.
Once we are done with his task, he's going to leave and it will be all good.
I suppose...
The villagers do seem to pay him great respect though.
Thankfully, it does not seem like they actually believe in this whole demon idea.
Of course it's all nonsense.
EH? You were listening all this time?
Don't worry, my lips are shut.
Unless you are interested in my oral skills.
*Sigh* Let's just get this over with.
